talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you headed to Gerudo Canyon too?<sp:0:4:0>Just know that after you've crossed the
bridge, the guard up ahead is gonna give
you a test.
Shiny_DegudoToGate:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Anyway, I was studying all night, so I'm
sure I'll get it right today!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Oh, so you want to hear about the test
after all?
Greeting_Day_Rain:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Want to shelter from the rain? There's
room for you here.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Are your studies going well, fella?
<sp:5:0:0>Boy, are mine ever not.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>I know you can pour water on yourself to
keep cool for a while, but that's it. That's
all I seem to retain.
Rain_GateToDegudo:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired_01>But I still failed, and now, I'm wet. I'm a
wet failure.
Common_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>That's right. All the questions are about
how to deal with hot and cold weather.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>But no matter how many times I try,<sp:5:0:0>
I can't seem to pass.
Common_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I thought I at least had the basics downâ€”
splashing yourself with water to cool
down, stuff like that.
Shiny_GateToDegudo:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>But clearly, I'm not prepared enough.
I better get back to studying.
Passed_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh, come on! You passed the test?!
That's not fair!
Greeting_Midnight:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sleep_01>Remembering things hurts... This is why
I hate tests...
Rain_DegudoToGate:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Which reminds me, did you know there's
no rain in Gerudo Canyon?<sp:0:4:0>How can you splash yourself with water
when there's no water?! It boggles and
bends the mind!
Passed_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>What is it, you test passer? Are you here
to gloat?
InTent:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Like, did you know that caves stay the
same cool temperature all day and night?<sp:0:4:0>Me neither! I just learned that...which
doesn't bode well for the test.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hey, wait!<sp:5:0:0> Are you headed to Gerudo
Canyon too?<sp:0:4:0>If you are, just know the guard up ahead
will give you a test.
